## State.hasTag() method

Whether the current state configuration has a state node with the specified `tag`<></>.

**Signature:**

```typescript
hasTag(tag: TTag): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  tag | TTag |  |

**Returns:**

boolean
